practiceAreas: Personal Injury|Premises Liability|Medical Malpractice|Motor Vehicle Accidents|Product Liability
description:
The Wieand Law Firm provides strong legal representation to individuals in Pennsylvania and neighboring New Jersey who were seriously injured or lost a loved one due to the negligence of another. We are pleased to serve clients at our Malvern location for a wide range of legal matters, including:

  • Personal injury
  • Wrongful death
  • Motor vehicle accidents
  • Whistleblower/qui tam
  • Product liability
  • Premises liability (slip and fall accidents)
  • Medical malpractice
  • Nursing home abuse and neglect

If you have suffered, physically, financially or emotionally, due to the negligence or carelessness of another individual, business or professional, the Wieand Law Firm can provide the guidance and legal support you need to seek justice in a Pennsylvania or New Jersey civil court.

To speak with an experienced trial lawyer about your personal injury claim call the Wieand Law Firm today. You can schedule a free initial consultation at our Malvern law office.
